#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
LL n,m;
LL mul(LL a,LL b,LL mo){
	LL s = 0;
	a %= mo;
	while (b){
		if (b & 1){
			s += a;
			if (s > mo) s -= mo;
		}
		a <<= 1;
		if (a > mo) a -= mo;
		b >>= 1;
	}
	return s;
}
LL ksm(LL a,LL b,LL mo){
	LL ans = 1;
	while (b){
		if (b & 1) ans = mul(ans,a,mo);
		b >>= 1;
		a = mul(a,a,mo);
	}
	return ans;
}
int check(LL n,LL m,LL j){
	LL a = rand()%(n-2) + 2;
	LL x = ksm(a,m,n);
	for (int i = 1;i <= j;i++){
		LL y = mul(x,x,n);
		if ((y == 1) && (x != 1) && (x != n - 1)) return false;
		x = y;
		if (y == 1) return true;
	}
	return false;
}
int Miller(LL x){
	if (x == 2) return true;
	if (!(x & 1)) return false;
	LL m = x - 1;LL j = 0;
	while (!(m & 1)) j++,m >>= 1;
	for (int i = 1;i <= 5;i++)
		if (!check(x,m,j)) return false;
	return true;
}
int main(){
	int T;scanf("%d",&T);
	while (T--){
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);
		if (m % 2 == 0 && m != 2) printf("%lld\n",m);
		else {
			if (Miller(m)){
				if (n == m || m <= 3) printf("-1\n");
				else printf("%lld\n",m-1);
			}else printf("%lld\n",m);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
